sentences.en: ...a collage of words and pictures from magazines.
sentences.cn: …用杂志上的词语和图片做成的拼贴画。

sentences.en: A collage of coloured paper covers a table top .
sentences.cn: 一副彩纸拼贴画盖在桌面上。

sentences.en: A collage of coloured paper covers a table top.
sentences.cn: 一副彩纸拼贴画盖在桌面上.
有趣的20世纪60年代歌曲的收藏集

sentences.en: Collage and pastiche are two important parody techniques employed in Ulysses.
sentences.cn: 摘要拼贴与仿作是《尤利西斯》中两种重要的戏拟技法.

sentences.en: Golf collage design featuring vintage golf bag and cart.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫拼贴设计,具有复古高尔夫球袋和购物车.

sentences.en: I wish to furbish up the French I learned at collage.
sentences.cn: 我想重温一下在大学里学过的法语.

sentences.en: Included are Celebrity Morph, Look - alike Meter , Celebrity Collage and Tag Photos.
sentences.cn: 包括很多名人的形态 、 名人标签和拼贴照片.

sentences.en: John: Yes I'd like to work until my collage reopens in September.
sentences.cn: 约翰: 是的,我想在9月开学前做一段事情.

sentences.en: Many zines tend to rely on comics, illustration, and collage.
sentences.cn: 不少杂志往往依靠漫画, 插图, 拼贴.

sentences.en: Mr. Brown is seeking a teaching position at the local collage.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生正在当地的大学谋求一份教书工作.

sentences.en: Rego's work is a rich collage of 20th-century painting styles.
sentences.cn: 瑞格的作品糅合了20世纪各种绘画风格。

sentences.en: She donated a large sum to the collage fund.
sentences.cn: 她向校基金捐赠一大笔钱.

sentences.en: Toys, computer fraud , collage, ever let me fondle admiringly.
sentences.cn: 成人玩具 、 电脑贴画等时尚玩艺, 曾经让我爱不释手.

sentences.en: Unfortunately for a collage artist, this is not the case.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是,对于大学教育艺术家来说, 并不是这样的.

sentences.en: With Vitamin E, Collage & Elastin, and Shea Butter.
sentences.cn: 维生素E, 拼贴 和 弹性蛋白, 和牛油果油.

trans.tran_cn: 拼贴画，大杂烩，拼贴艺术
trans.tran_en: a picture made by sticking other pictures, photographs, cloth etc onto a surface
